title: Doug Demuro
description:
It's Doug Demuro! Doug has a giant YouTube channel. He's made a career out of pointing out all the details and weird little things about cars. We talk about EVERYTHING. His Ford GT, his weird G Wagen, how to film cars, what he likes about driving and not driving, the collector market, and more. 

Check out Doug's new auction site! https://carsandbids.com/

Watch all of Doug's stuff here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCsqjHFMB_JYTaEnf_vmTNqg

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman @dougdemuro

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman

 

Watch the show!: https://youtu.be/FX0QeMjMq4A
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
